catalyst: Spin-off of non-core division creates value unlock
description:
**Example Value Stock** - Mature industrial company with hidden value.

**The Bull Case:**
• Trading at 0.8x book value (historical avg: 1.5x)
• Strong balance sheet: $20/share in cash, minimal debt
• Spin-off of low-margin division will unlock $15/share in value
• Core business generates 15% ROE consistently
• Management committed to returning capital (buybacks + dividends)
• Insider buying at current levels

**The Bear Case:**
• Mature industry with low growth (2-3% annually)
• Cyclical exposure to industrial production
• Spin-off execution risk
• Competition from lower-cost overseas producers
• Capex requirements limiting free cash flow

**The Key Question:**
Is the market undervaluing the sum-of-parts post spin-off? Asset coverage suggests 40% upside with limited downside given cash position.

**Valuation:**
• Current Price: $45
• Book Value: $55/share
• Cash: $20/share
• Sum-of-Parts (post spin-off): $65/share
• Upside: ~45%
